content: this legal document outlines the distribution of assets among several parties it describes the properties involved including an apartment with three bedrooms two bathrooms and two balconies as well as a workshop the document confirms that the building was acquired through succession and was constructed before september 1 1967 the parties agree to terminate their joint ownership and allocate the shares accordingly one party receives the bare ownership of the apartment and garage another party receives full ownership of the workshop and a third party receives the life usufruct of the apartment garage and a portion of the workshop the document concludes by assigning values to each share
